about_the_game:
This artbook contains illustrations, concept art, and early sketch about the game's characters, backgrounds, items, equipment, enemies, etc.
- Pixel art 26 pages
- Design sketches 14 pages
- Art illustrations 28 pages

[Where to find the DLC: Go to your Library in the Steam client. Right click the game and select Properties. Then select DLC. From the DLC installation and management menu you can see if you have "SuperAlloyRanger DigitalArtbook" and whether if it's been installed.]
detailed_description:
This artbook contains illustrations, concept art, and early sketch about the game's characters, backgrounds, items, equipment, enemies, etc.
- Pixel art 26 pages
- Design sketches 14 pages
- Art illustrations 28 pages

[Where to find the DLC: Go to your Library in the Steam client. Right click the game and select Properties. Then select DLC. From the DLC installation and management menu you can see if you have "SuperAlloyRanger DigitalArtbook" and whether if it's been installed.]

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, CentOS 7 and SteamOS 3.3 - (64 bit)
  • Processor: 64-bit processor with 2,4 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor
  • Processor: MacOS X 10.10.5 or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
